item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup member,

How are you?
How was your holidays? Wish you all well!

Here is our December meetup which everyone has been waiting for. Hope you all can join me!

We had a wonderful discussion last time. Thanks for all your sharing and inputs. It was great!

Last time, we discussed about "Causation". It is like an old saying" What comes around goes around". Everything happened to us has a reason. If we haven't understood that we may suffer from the process of learning.

If we can transform our mindset, then everything around us could be very different. I am the one starting the peaceful energy and I am also the one stopping the vicious cycle. Even it is a tinny thing, it may make a huge different.

This month, we are going to share and discuss more about how to transform ourselves. Look at world in a peaceful way! It is also a spiritual practice. So we have deeper understanding about spiritual being.

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and let's create positive energy to the whole world. Hope see you all in our meetup.

Jonathan

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the 2nd building on your right hand side when you drive into condos.You can park any place. call me if you can not find it 6172237166
item.name: Westborough Spiritual December Meetup
